item.description:
Hey all.... In tradition of the FPA, let's go for dinner on Wednesday...wx permitting...

AFN... Jaffrey for some lobster rolls or fried clams.... A short hop... We can change to Parlin or elsewhere if we want... Or just head out to one of our local favorites... Cheap fuel too!

Harvey at AFN likes us out of there before sunset.

See you all Wednesday nite....

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Lobsta Rolls at Jaffrey... No Really this time!
